EXAMPLE.title: This is the title for the example that will be the heading of the section and appear in the menu

SECTION.DESC: This is a section that shows the same exact code in both Javascript and Ruby. Wherever possible we should show both. If the example is showing how JS and RUby talk to each other then use the other method

CODE.RUBY: This is the RUBY code that is to be shown in a code block
CODE.JAVASCRIPT: This is the same exact code but in JAVASCRIPT that is to be shown in a code block

SECTION.DESC: This is the section that will appear before the code block
SECTION.CODE: This is the code that is to be shown in a code block

SECTION.DESC: this is another section that is part of the same example, use multi sections when want to separate code blocks with descriptions for each
SECTION.CODE: This is the second code block of the same example
